question: For how many times, India has emerged as winner in the Malaysia Masters badminton tournament since it began in 2009?
explanation: India has emerged winner in the Malaysia Masters badminton tournament for three times since it began in 2009. P.V. Sindhu won it in 2013 and 2016, and Saina Nehwal in 2017. This year, B. Sai Praneeth has been already knocked out.
